channel.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
channel.description: Feel free to move if this is the wrong place to put this. The other day I was thinking about both engines and i thought,"Wait, this was a required part of HL1 but isn't possible in the source engine..." I went to my computer to post about it but when i opened the page I forgot it... :facepalm: It's been killin me the past few days thinking about it and I still don't have. The point of this thread is to post something that you needed to complete HL1 but can''t be done in the source engine. Hopefully reading your posts (if you can think of any) will remind me of my thought...

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

:hmph:

You people are confusing currently used features with engine abilities.

I thought we were talking about things that Goldsrc could do that Source cannot?

Ah screw it, I don’t know what I’m talking about. :retard:

Read full topic
item.source: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Mr. Someguy:

Probably been said already, but:

In Half-Life, the Alien Grunts has bullet proof armor, you can’t do that in Source.

:hmph:

You people are confusing currently used features with engine abilities.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Hero_of_Time96:

Bunny hopping that’s actually effective?

It does this.

jethrosoup:

How about being an integral part of my childhood?

It does this too, unless you’re old.

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I wonder how many people noticed that the soda cans healed you right on the first playthrough.

I only noticed that on the 5th playthrough.

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
Seeing as soda machines had 5 buttons, and could be pressed twice for 2 cans each, 10 hp maximum. Even better if you had 2 machines around.

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
sersoft:

Well they only gave you 1hp each in hl1 so it’s not a big loss.

I wouldn’t say that; those soda cans saved my arse many times when I had under 10hp.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
And well, since the dev team is going in a realistic angle for the design of the game, it seems kinda out of place having soda cans that can heal you 1hp at a time.

item.source: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: Teh_Casino
item.description:
Dillxn:

Does BM currently support healing soda cans?

Raminator:

You can dispense cans by pressing the buttons, or you can smash in the front of the machine and have it spew out a bunch more, but you won’t get healed by it.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source

item.title: Possible in Goldsrc, not in Source
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I still want to know why was that feature left off. It’s certainly not because it’s too hard to code. Most likely a design decision but for reasons unexplained.

Read full topic
